indicator_name: Implementing Agency for Sectoral Conditonal Actions
value: INDC implementation will be taken forward by existing governance arrangements under the BCCSAP, with coordination being managed by the climate change secretariat in the Ministry of Environment and Forests, reporting to the Advisory Committee and the National Environment Committee (chaired by the Prime Minister)

value: Ministry of Health, Wellness and Environment will be responsible for facilitating multilateral dialogue on climate change issues as well as overseeing implementation of the INDC

value: The implementation process is still under discussion to ensure that there is highest participation and ownership from the key actors.
